mapper.insert: insert into message (sendid, receiveid, msgcontent, msgcheck) values(#{sendid},#{receiveid},#{msgcontent},#{msgcheck})
mapper.select: select messagenum, sendid, receiveid, msgcontent, date_format(msregdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as msregdate, msgcheck from message where receiveid = #{userid} and sendid = 'system' order by msregdate desc;

select messagenum, sendid, receiveid, msgcontent, date_format(msregdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as msregdate, msgcheck from message where receiveid = #{userid} and sendid != 'system' order by msregdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into message (sendid, receiveid, msgcontent, msgcheck, linkstring) values(#{sendid},#{receiveid},#{msgcontent},#{msgcheck},#{linkstring})
